snippet.title: Beneath - Official Release Window Announcement Trailer | OTK Games Expo 2024
snippet.description:
Beneath is a first-person action-adventure horror game developed by Camel 101. Play as Noah Quinn on a deep sea dive to explore what lies below the water to uncover mysterious underwater stations, defeat enemies, and ultimately escape. Beneath is launching in Q1 2025 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#Gaming #Games #IGN
